codeSnippet.name: Load one entity by query
codeSnippet.text: val entity = dataManager.load(${entityClass}::class.java) .query(${query}) <% params.eachWithIndex{ param, i -> print '.parameter("' + param + '", paramValue' + (i == 0 ? '' : i) + ')\n '} %>.one()

codeSnippet.name: Load optional entity by query
codeSnippet.text: val entity = dataManager.load(${entityClass}::class.java) .query(${query}) <% params.eachWithIndex{ param, i -> print '.parameter("' + param + '", paramValue' + (i == 0 ? '' : i) + ')\n '} %>.optional()

codeSnippet.name: Load list of entities by query
codeSnippet.text: val myEntityList = dataManager.load(${entityClass}::class.java) .query(${query}) <% params.eachWithIndex{ param, i -> print '.parameter("' + param + '", paramValue' + (i == 0 ? '' : i) + ')\n '} %>.list()

codeSnippet.name: Load scalar or aggregate values
codeSnippet.text: val values = dataManager.loadValues("select e.firstName, e.lastName from User e") .properties("firstName", "lastName") .list()

codeSnippet.name: Load single scalar or aggregate value
codeSnippet.text: Long userCount = dataManager.loadValue("select count(e) from User e", Long.class).one();
val userCount = dataManager.loadValue("select count(e) from User e", Long::class.java).one()
